response.job_title: Jefe Soporte de Producto Construcción y Minería
response.summary: Mechanical engineer from the Universidad Nacional de Colombia with experience in tool design, data management, inventory control and supply chain, maintenance and suppliers management. Knowledge in design software such as SolidWorks, SolidEdge and AutoCAD, Office suite and use of computational tools. Strong interests in renewable energy, manufacturing and turbomachinery.
response.skills: Manufacturing Engineering, Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, Solidworks, Solid Edge, Welding, Mechanical Testing Of Materials, Mechanical Engineering, Ingeniería mecánica, Matlab, Soldaduras, SolidWorks, Estrategia empresarial, Inglés, Microsoft Excel, Educación de adultos, Educación

profile_positions.description:
Soporte de producto de maquinaria de construcción y minería al área comercial.
Puente directo entre fábricas y la compañía
profile_positions.title: Jefe Soporte de Producto

profile_positions.description:
- Preventive and corrective maintenance coordination alongside production management
- Review of manuals and requirements and formulation of datasheets and maintenance plans for the production machinery
- Suppliers contact and management
- Formulation of procedures and training of the production personal
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Calculate inventory rotation to maintain healthy inventory
- Analyze inventory movement and order required new machines
- Calculate KPI & indicators for reports
profile_positions.title: Inventory Control Analyst

profile_positions.description: - Analyze and filter maintenance information for platform migration and standardization (Team AMOS)
profile_positions.title: Data Cleansing Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Special tools design for maintenance
- Current tools analysis to draw manufacturing blueprints
- Analysis of maintenance plans for maintenance ports for BOEING 747 planes and design of  all the maintenance workbenches
profile_positions.title: Tools Engineer – Apprentice

company.name: Praco Didacol S.A.S
company.description: Praco Didacol S.A. is an automotive company based out of Carrera 70 No. 99a - 00, Bogota, Cundinamarca, Colombia.
